long_description: Furnishing the same legendary strength of the original Pelican Case, this mini case provides protection to small electronic items. Ideally suited for a larger cell phone, camera, PDA, game player, pager, radio or other small item; interior space is 6.56 x 3.94 x 2.75 inches. Offering robust protection to your valuables, this case is water-resistant, dust-proof and sports an automatic pressure purge valve. Soft, rubberized case liner helps protect contents from bumps and jolts. Exterior features a carabiner clip and strap attachment point. Not intended for climbing or load-bearing use.
short_description: Furnishing the same legendary strength of the original Pelican Case, this mini case provides protection to small electronic items.
